description.value: Rim and body sherd (rejoined from three fragments) of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band around rim and glazed black below; exterior: on tip of rim, narrow black line; below rim, dot and billet pattern between concentric brown lines; painted decoration consisting of sphinx (only tip of wing, back, rump and tail remaining), to left; swastika, elaborate rosette and corner pendant roundel as filling ornament; at right, vertical dividing band consisting of broken maeander between parallel lines.

description.value: Rim sherd of Chiot pottery light chalice; interior: black; white band at top of rim; lotus and palmette in red and white with two white bands below; exterior: rim decoration: broken cable between brown lines; head (added red on mane), part of neck and shoulder (black) of bridled horse to right; tail (black) of another horse to right.  Black, brown, red and white (on interior) on white slip.
